name: reverse
description: Returns a new string representing the input string in reverse order.
note: This function keeps unicode grapheme clusters together during reversal.

params.name: str
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: str
params.description: String expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

examples: ROW message = "Some Text" | EVAL message_reversed = REVERSE(message);
